column5: Sorry for your loss Gary & condolances from Diane and I, Mom's are always a treasure.  Sounds like your Mom lived a good life.  I too remember when you originally posted that picture.

I am so sorry for your loss. That picture is wonderful, it tells so much about her life and your relationship. I'm sure she would want you to celibrate her life rather than mourn her passing.  Our thoughts and prayers are with you and your family.  Cliff & Sue
sorry to hear about the passing of your mom.  all the best in this difficult time
Sorry to hear about your mom.  Pam
very sorry to hear about your loss my thoughts and prayers go out to your family  GOD BLESS HER  Hawg Hunter
My deepest sympathies.Looks like she enjoyed life to the fullest.  MTP
You have my deepest sympathies my friend.
Sorry to hear Gary.  My condolences. When I saw your post, I remembered when I first saw that pic you posted of your mom a while ago, it looks like a great moment.
Gary hope you like the song.I know it,s a vid for Elvis but the song has great meaning.
Sorry about the sad news Gary. She sure had a full life. Can't ask for anything more. All the best my friend.
My regards to you and your family.  outdoorguy61
sorry about your loss..i lost my father in july and its tough
Sorry for you loss.  Bunk
My condolences Gary. Never easy when a loved one passes.  My thougts are with you.
all our best from here in Chatham Mike and family
Very sorry Gary on the loss of your mom.  Our condolences to you.  That is wonderful picture of her you posted.
Sorry for your loss.   Paul
Sorry to hear of your loss Gary,our condolences to you and your family,Brian
Sorry for your loss Gary.  My condolences to you and your family.
she lived a good long life and I am sure you have many fond memories to keep her alive in your heart for years to come   remember the good times
Sorry to hear about your mother Gary.  My condolances.  Its sounds like she lived a full, long life, and that pic of her shows her zest for life.  Joey
My condolences
All the best to you and your family.  lovetofish
I'm very sorry to hear about the loss of your mother.  My condolences to you and your family.  That is a terrific picture of her, and represents a great life.
my condolences
Very sorry for your loss Garry...  All the best to you and your family...
....Please accept my sincerest condolences as well Gary.
So sorry Gary. What a great picture of your Mom. God bless her.
My condolences, its not easy losing a loved one but it looks like your Mom lived a full life! Most of us will be lucky to live to see 90 years!
my condolences sorry for your loss  rob

I have felt your pain Gary, my Mother passed away a few years ago at 92.  She lived a full life too, but it still hurts to see her go.  Treasure all the good memories and the fortune that she brought you into the world. My thoughts are with you.
Thanks to all for the kind words.
So sorry for your loss.  She is with her Mom now.  Thinking of you and your family.
I remember that photo Gary, very sweet. My deepest condolances.
Very sorry to hear of the bad news Gary. You can be assured that yes, she is in peace.  My best wishes to you, your family and your Mothers friends.
My condolences to you and your family Gary. She sure looked like she was having a ball in that picture! DebS
Best to Gary Vacek and family.  Everything in its time.

My sincerest condolences. My thoughts and prayers are with you and your family during this difficult time. 90, I can only wish, my grandfather is still kicking at 95 but he's definitely seen better days.
Sorry to hear that Gary. Very sorry for your loss. That's gotta be tough bud.  I dread the thought that someday I will lose my mother. I'm hoping it's MANY years away. Take care.
My sympathies to you and your family... Its horrible and all to common time to loose a loved one.  Take care,

Mom has been slipping for the last few months, and at 90 she has had a good life.  Yesterday she took a turn for the worse and she passed this morning about 6:30.  Her life was long and fulfilling and although I'll miss her I know she has gone to a better place and a place without pain.  I haven't posted this picture in a while but it's one of my favorites taken on the Montreal River by Elk Cabins when she was in her 80's.  I think it captured her spirit well.
Sorry to hear my friend. One of the hardest loses there is in life.
Sorry to hear that Gary, I'm sure she was a great lady and you will miss her... my condolences.  Shes as close to heaven in that picture as you can get!  (Montreal River That is...)
Very sorry to hear about your loss Gary, but I think she's in a much better place now.  That picture is a GREAT one...one that truly shows her love of life.
Sorry for your loss Gary, a fitting tribute indeed. Best wishes to you and your family. HH
My condolences to your family.
sorry to hear of your loss gary,  my deepest sympathies
Sorry for your loss
I'm sorry Gary.
My condolences also Gary.
My deepest sympathies to you Gary, I lost my Mother a few years ago so I know how you feel.

Deeply sorry for you loss Gary. Like you say she live a good long life. She saw most of todays technology unfold... going from the simple life to todays complications and most of all she had you as a son to fill both of your heads full of memories.
My condolences to you family.  A
My condolences to you and your family, Gary.
Sorry to hear the bad news Gary...Moms were our best friends...What a great picture as a keepsake...!
Saddened by the loss of your mother.  Our condolences to you and your family  John and Diane
my condolences to you and your family Gary sorry for your loss,its something I dont ever wanna go thru
Sincere condolences Gary. That photo says it all.  John...
my condolences to you and your family.
Very sorry for your loss Gary.
Sorry to hear about your loss Gary.  My thoughts are with you and your family.  Mike
Very sorry to hear this, deepest condolences.
Gary.......our friend. Both Charmaine an I send our deepest condolences your way.  Wayne said it best........ She had you as a son...with memories filled with life. God Bless
Very sorry for your loss.  Sincerely, 1leg
My condolences to you and your family.
